thread.title: Tanzania: Kikwete to Chair Business Council Meeting
thread.title_full: Tanzania: Kikwete to Chair Business Council Meeting

title: Tanzania: Kikwete to Chair Business Council Meeting
text:
Tanzania: CCM and Opposition Bank On Youth Votes 
"This crucial meeting will attract ministers, permanent secretaries and business leaders to deliberate issues related to improving national competitiveness and economic prosperity," he said, adding that preparations for the meeting have already been completed. 
According Eng. Mbilinyi, the Council's chairman among other issues will receive two task force reports on improving business environment and tourism transformation. 
He said the meeting will also reinforce the need to maintain a competitive business environment for attracting private investments. 
Poverty reduction, cutting down administrative costs of doing business for Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs) in an effort to facilitate rapid job creation and private sector-led economy," he stressed. 
TNBC is a platform that provides strategic forum for public and private sector leaders to deliberate issues of promoting economic growth. 
The council also gives room for members to exchange views on improving business regulatory environment to enhance national economic competitiveness in the long run. Tanzania
